failures.test: GitManager > cloneAndBranch calls git clone + checkout
failures.error: expected "vi.fn()" to be called 2 times, but got 3 times
failures.root_cause: Pre-existing regression: the developer's commit added tryEnableEntire() to cloneAndBranch, which makes a third spawnSync call (to run 'entire enable'). The existing test asserted exactly 2 calls (git clone + git checkout) and was not updated to account for the new call.
failures.suggestion: Update the test to expect 3 calls (or use toHaveBeenCalledWith checks rather than toHaveBeenCalledTimes), OR have the developer conditionally guard the tryEnableEntire call so it doesn't fire in test mode.

regressions.test: GitManager > cloneAndBranch calls git clone + checkout
regressions.introduced_by: Developer commit (19fa2ab) that added tryEnableEntire() to cloneAndBranch without updating the existing test assertion

coverage.note: Coverage collection not configured in vitest.config.ts; raw counts not available. New tests cover all identified code paths for the per-step commit feature.
